main.docTitle: Water Pollution Control (Western Buffer Water Control Zone) Order

section.name: s1
section.heading: Declaration of Western Buffer Water Control Zone
section.content: That part of Hong Kong described in the Schedule is declared to be a water control zone for the purposes of the Ordinance, and is to be known as the Western Buffer Water Control Zone.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Designation of Authority
section.content: The Director of Environmental Protection is designated as the Authority for the Western Buffer Water Control Zone.

schedule.name: sch0
schedule.content: The area of Hong Kong bounded by grey edging on a series of maps of the scale of 1:20 000 marked WBWCZ 1 and WBWCZ 2 described as “Western Buffer Water Control Zone” signed by the Secretary for Planning, Environment and Lands on 19 May 1993 and deposited in the Land Registry.
